General.Name: Tay Ninh Cable Car Tour Co.
General.Description: Tay Ninh Cable Car Tour Joint-stock Company transports tourists, goods, and materials by means of cable cars in Vietnam. The company is also involved in the provision of passenger transportation by tube cars; rental of advertising on panels, cabins, and pylons; transfer of entertainment technology from foreign; trades in various types of entertainment; and trading, import, and export of materials, equipment, and agricultural products. In addition, it provides business travel services; and acts as an agent for consigned goods. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tay Ninh, Vietnam.
